item.title: What Israel’s UNRWA Ban Could Mean for Palestinians
item.description: Legislation that goes into effect on Thursday bars UNRWA from operating in the country. That will affect aid delivery to Gaza and beyond.

item.title: A Plane Crash Near Washington, and 3 Contentious Senate Hearings
With Sweeping Executive Orders, Trump Tests Local Control of Schools

item.title: Salwan Momika, Who Burned a Quran in Sweden, Is Killed
item.description: Salwan Momika, an Iraqi immigrant in Sweden, set off enormous protests when he burned a Quran in 2023. He had been scheduled to appear in court on Thu...

item.title: Shell and Equinor Oil and Gas Production Is Blocked at Sites Off British Coast
item.description: A court ruling requires the British government to consider the potential climate impact of the oil and gas produced in the North Sea.
